attributes.action: Suspend Zac Goldsmith from Parliment for his Islamophobic Campaign in London
attributes.background: Zac Goldsmith's campaign to become Mayor of London has been one that is Islamophobic, devisive and a clear attack on moderate muslims. His campaign is one that could potentially radicalise, disintegrate and segregate young aspiring muslims. This campaign is a disgrace to the British Politics.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of the views or opinions they express while campaigning.
